name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in quality assurance and testing, focusing on both manual and automated testing approaches. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, with a proven track record in API testing using **Postman** and implementing automated testing frameworks such as **Cypress** and **Playwright**. Adept in managing asynchronous workflows and integrating solutions with **OAuth**, webhooks, and various calendar APIs like **Google Calendar** and **Outlook Calendar**.

Skilled in leveraging communication and documentation best practices to ensure seamless project execution and stakeholder engagement. Experienced in utilizing collaboration tools such as **Zoom**, **Meet**, and **Teams** to facilitate remote teamwork and address testing challenges effectively. Committed to enhancing product quality and ensuring compliance with industry standards.
